title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4006.4 - Minors not to be employed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4006.4 - Minors not to be employed

State Regulations

No stable may have in its employment in any capacity
any employee under 16 years of age, except as may be permitted by the
applicable laws of the State of New York. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4006.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
